features: AE lock, AF Lock, Auto Power Save, DPOF Support, Date/Time Stamp, Direct Print, Histogram Display, PictBridge Support, depth-of-field preview button, display brightness control
exposurecompensation: ±5 EV range, in 1/2 or 1/3 EV steps
shootingprograms: Close-up, Landscape, Night landscape, Night portrait, Portrait mode, Sports mode
screendetails: LCD display - TFT active matrix - 1.8" - colour
lightsensitivity: ISO 1600, ISO 200, ISO 320, ISO 400, ISO 600, ISO 800
flashmodes: Auto Mode, Fill-in mode, flash OFF mode, rear curtain sync, red-eye reduction, slow synchro
exposuremodes: Automatic, Programme, aperture-priority, bulb, manual, shutter-priority
connectortypes: 1 x USB, 1 x composite video output
operatingsystemsupported: MS Windows 2000, MS Windows ME, MS Windows XP
